author: maxb
msg: svndumpfilter: Fix erroneous erasure of delete-all-properties-from-node events
(set_node_property): Raise an error if a delta property block is detected.

author: sunny256
msg: Update of the Norwegian nb.po file.

author: jaa
msg: Correct the location of rebuild flags, and don't clutter root directory with
Store rebuilding flag by project names, not by repository:
Use LOG_FILE_DIR as anchor where to store log files
(LOG_FILE_DIR): New variable, store logs files here.
Use $LOG_FILE_DIR as anchor where to store log files

author: kfogel
msg: Finish issue #1954: Check that a path is valid before creating it in
the repository.  Do the check on both client and server sides, so that
new clients working with old servers are protected too.
(svn_fs_make_dir, svn_fs_make_file, svn_fs_copy): Ensure path is valid.
(tab_test): Test mkdir, copy, and rename on URLs with tabs.
